column2: Reformation Boise presents In Christ Alone Conference
column3:
November 8th, 2019: 6:00pm – 9:30pm November 9th, 2019: 8:30am – 2:15pm Location Valley Shepherd Church of the Nazarene 150 W Maestra St Meridian, Idaho 83642 Speakers: Mark Jones (PhD Leiden University) – Pastor at Faith Reformed Presbyterian Church in Vancouver. The Boise March for Life takes place every January on the weekend anniversary of Roe v Wade to commemorate the over 50 million unborn children that have been lost since the infamous Supreme Court ruling. The March and rally that follows are a celebration of life and demonstration in the belief that all life is sacred. On Saturday, January 18, 2020, Right to Life of Idaho will host the 47th Annual Boise March for Life!! Please, help us get the word out for the 2020 Boise March for Life! column2: Life of Christ Conference – Faith Community Bible Church
column3:
The Passion Week of Jesus, the pivot point on which all of human history turns, is at once the most awful and the most blessed week in all of human history. Join us as we welcome back Dr. Doug Bookman for a Bible Conference which traces the course of those final days of Jesus’ mortal life. Dr. Bookman is a professor at Shepherd’s Theological Seminary, and is a premiere scholar of the New Testament, specializing in the life of Christ. He’s led over 50 trips to Israel and his passion, humor, engagement, and seriousness is second to none. Extensive notes will be provided, time will be

column2: A New Beginning Adoption Seminars and Webinars Spring 2019
column3:
A New Beginning Adoption Agency offers FREE Adoption Information Seminars once a month and we discuss U.S. Infant Adoptions. the Foster-Adoption Program, International and Private Adoptions. It’s a great opportunity to meet your Adoption Specialist, learn about the Adoption Process, Legal expectations and training. Adoption Panel Discussions are also FREE but also give you a chance to talk to adoptive families and adoptees who have been through the Adoption Journey. Click to learn more!

CIRQUE ITALIA IS THRILLED TO PRESENT THEIR NEWEST AND GREATEST CREATION – AQUATIC SPECTACULAR

\

Aquatic Spectacular offers two hours of high-end entertainment. Beautiful aerialists dazzle and shimmer on a chandelier high above the ground, but they aren’t the only ones that will draw your eyes toward the sky. You can expect to see contortion in a bubble, a Venetian aerial duo, and even someone hula hooping while in the air. Don’t worry about getting your eyes checked, you aren’t seeing double; there are TWO lasermen. Duo jugglers, duo roller-skaters, the always breathtaking wheel of death………the list goes on and on. It is even possible for a pre-historic dinosaur to make an appearance. Let your imagination wander, because anything is possible in this new whimsical production.

Sue has been involved with the pro-life movement since the early 1990’s. She was introduced to LifeHouse of Houston through her church and started volunteering in 1992. LifeHouse is a Christ-centered ministry ensuring life for the unborn children by providing opportunities for housing, help and hope for women during their pregnancies and beyond. column2: Compassion Experience – Harvest Life Church, Nampa
column3:
Harvest Life Church would love to invite your family to come tour the Compassion Experience. Tours start Friday November 21 at 10am and run daily until 6pm. Bring your family out to experience what it’s like for a child to live in a developing country More than 700 million people in developing countries live on less than $1.90 per day, facing challenges most Americans never will. Compassion International’s The Compassion Experience is currently traveling the United States and Canada, and will bring visitors on a journey into the lives of Compassion-sponsored children living in countries like Uganda, the Philippines, Kenya and Guatemala. A self-guided tour

column2: Nampa Family Justice Center- Mandated Child Abuse Reporting Laws for “Duly Ordained Minister of Religion”
column3:
This 2-hour presentation will give an overview of Idaho law regarding the reporting of abuse, abandonment, and neglect. It will pay special attention to the law that covers mandated reporting for Duly Ordained Ministers of Religion along with exemptions. It will cover the most common signs and symptoms of child abuse, to help identify if children within your church may be at risk and how to respond if you believe a child is being abused.

column2: Awaken the Dawn in Idaho: Tent America 2018
column3:
On the heels Awaken the Dawn 2017, our next assignment is Tent America 2018. On September 27-29, again, coinciding with the Feast of Tabernacles, we will be hosting ‘tent city’ gatherings of worship, music, prayer, and gospel proclamation – simultaneously at all 50 state capitals and on college and university campuses!
